members.name: name
members.comment: Returns the name of the attribute view.

return: the name of the attribute view

name: java.nio.file.attribute.AttributeView
comment: An object that provides a read-only or updatable view of non-opaque values associated with an object in a filesystem. This interface is extended or implemented by specific attribute views that define the attributes supported by the view. A specific attribute view will typically define type-safe methods to read or update the attributes that it supports.
